(c:hunter}Texas. Washington

Her only help was Washington, who spent a lot of the time undercover, and even when he wasn't he wasn't around to be of Assistance.

She reached her room and walked in, taking off all her Armour but her boots and then laying down in her bed. Sighing in relaxation, the rest was short lived, before she heard a knock at the door. Mad she sat up right and stormed over the door. It slid open to reveal Washington standing there in a black jumpsuit, looking shy. Tex, now furious at Wash for interrupting her R&R she screamed at him.

Texas: "What do you want?!"
Washington: " im sorry for not being more helpful in the field and I was wondering if there was something I could do to help?"
Tex: "Well there is one thing..."

York and Carolina were walking through the halls of the Mother of Invention, hand-in-hand. As they reached Carolina's room, she opened the door and pulled him inside, giggling.

"So," York said, putting one hand on her waist, on hand on the back of her head and bringing her close. "Now that you've got me, what're you gonna do with me?" He asked, giving her a quick kiss in the lips as she smiled deviously.

"I'm not exactly sure I'm the one whose got you." She said with a slight giggle, wriggling helplessly in his strong arms.

"Oh really? So what you're saying is that you're asking me what to do?" He said, brushing his lips against her neck and smiling.

"Well, I guess I am." She said, laying her head n his chest.

"All I want is for you to be happy." He said, smiling down at her. "What do you want to do?" He said sweetly.

"Well... there is one thing." She said. "But you have promise not to laugh." She said, blushing.

"Of course I won't." He said, smiling at her and giving her a small kiss on the cheek.

"Well," She said, hesitantly. "I've always wanted to..."
13211.title: York

132111.content:
"I've kind of always wanted someone to punish me, but I've been too embarrassed to ask anyone." Carolina turned a deep shade of red, looking at her feet, while York processed this information.

Finally, he said "What do you mean 'punish' you?" Carolina shifted awkwardly.

"I mean... you know... spanking, stuff like that." York chuckled a little. "Hey you said you wouldn't laugh!" Carolina exclaimed.

"You want me to spank you?" He asked.

"Yeah, well, not necessarily. I mean... look, it's not much of a punishment if I tell you." Carolina explained. "Spanking, yes, but it would be better if you think of something yourself."

info.brief_description: Have fun with the amazing kick-ass women of the famous Project Freelancer.
info.description:
This is a story that allows you to do pretty much anything with the wonderful women of Project Freelancer! I havent seen a story like this about them, so this should be interesting.

Rules:
1. Don't kill main characters
2. Try to keep the stuff at least a bit realistic, no magical growing or shrinking crap
3. Have fun
4. Be creative!

The first few chapters will basically be customization for your character and stuff, then the good stuff'll start.
